definition: on the up/currently winning/rising (in popularity etc)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to take the lead/to gain the upper hand

sentences.english: Since the bosses can't do without profit workers have an dege.
sentences.chinese: 由於老闆不能沒有利潤，工人們就佔了上風。

sentences.english: Rational selfinterest is not always the dominating factor.
sentences.chinese: 理性的個體利益不總是佔上風的因素。

sentences.english: I've had my victories over the years.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年中，我也曾佔過上風。

sentences.english: The wind blew hard all night but let up at daybreak .
sentences.chinese: 整個晚上風颳很厲害，但到破曉時風勢減弱了。

sentences.english: Once again, Beijing may have overplayed its hand.
sentences.chinese: 中國當局有可能再度高估了自己的上風。

sentences.english: Instead, however, United countered this tactic by taking advantage when possession changed hands.
sentences.chinese: 不過，當控球權易手時，曼聯卻通過反擊佔了上風。

sentences.english: "The Swedes got the best of us. "Captain Clark Donatelli said.
sentences.chinese: “瑞典人佔了我們的上風，”隊長多納塔利說。“
加上風凍效應是零下三十度。

sentences.english: Union superiority interdiscipline development construction education pattern.
sentences.chinese: 結合上風跨學科發展的建築教育模式。

sentences.english: Money talks way too loud in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，金錢萬能太佔上風了。

sentences.english: Aerator should be generally placed in the center of fishpond or like windward on the drawing.
sentences.chinese: 增氧機一般應放置在魚池中央，或圖略偏上風的位置。

sentences.english: Anakin continued to hold his own alone, urged to the offensive by Palpatine's goading.
sentences.chinese: 阿納金單槍匹馬，在帕爾帕廷的煽動下佔據了上風。

sentences.english: Use the yucky orange-colored oil when cooking for children or those with a severe head cold.
sentences.chinese: 給孩子或者上風的人做飯時候記得用噁心的橙色油。

sentences.english: The boat clawed off slowly until it reached the wind.
sentences.chinese: 船緩緩地轉向上風，直到迎到了風。

sentences.english: Which scenario will prevail in the months ahead?
sentences.chinese: 今後的幾個月哪種結局會佔上風？

sentences.english: Until fairly recently, it seemed that Chevron would prevail.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，似乎雪佛龍公司將佔上風。

definition: leeward/downwind/disadvantageous position/to concede or give way in an argument
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
to fit one into the other/to bring two things into contact
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
